item.title: [afc] Anger
item.description:
Creature — Incarnation

Haste

As long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.

item.title: [afc] Bogardan Hellkite
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flash

Flying

When Bogardan Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

item.title: [afc] Apex of Power
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile the top seven cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among them.

If this spell was cast from your hand, add ten mana of any one color.

item.title: [afc] Commune with Lava
item.description:
Instant

Exile the top X cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

item.title: [afc] Chaos Warp
item.description:
Instant

The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

item.title: [afc] Chain Reaction
item.description:
Sorcery

Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.

item.title: [afc] Dragonlord's Servant
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Shaman

Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

item.title: [afc] Disrupt Decorum
item.description:
Sorcery

Goad all creatures you don't control. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)

item.title: [afc] Dire Fleet Daredevil
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate

First strike

When Dire Fleet Daredevil enters the battlefield, exile target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard. You may cast it this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell. If that spell would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

item.title: [afc] Demanding Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Demanding Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage to target opponent unless that player sacrifices a creature.

item.title: [afc] Dark-Dweller Oracle
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Shaman

{1}, Sacrifice a creature: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)

item.title: [afc] Izzet Chemister
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Wizard

Haste

{R}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.

{1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Izzet Chemister: Cast any number of cards exiled with Izzet Chemister without paying their mana costs.

item.title: [afc] Ignite the Future
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile the top three cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, you may play cards this way without paying their mana costs.

Flashback {7}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [afc] Hoard-Smelter Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

{3}{R}: Destroy target artifact. Hoard-Smelter Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that artifact's mana value.

item.title: [afc] Etali, Primal Storm
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elder Dinosaur

Whenever Etali, Primal Storm attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of spells from among those cards without paying their mana costs.

item.title: [afc] Dragonmaster Outcast
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

item.title: [afc] Opportunistic Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Opportunistic Dragon enters the battlefield, choose target Human or artifact an opponent controls. For as long as Opportunistic Dragon remains on the battlefield, gain control of that permanent, it loses all abilities, and it can't attack or block.

item.title: [afc] Magmaquake
item.description:
Instant

Magmaquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each planeswalker.

item.title: [afc] Loyal Apprentice
item.description:
Creature — Human Artificer

Haste

Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. That token gains haste until end of turn.

item.title: [afc] Light Up the Stage
item.description:
Sorcery

Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)

Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

item.title: [sld] Eldrazi Monument
item.description:
Artifact

Creatures you control get +1/+1 and have flying and indestructible.

At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. If you can't, sacrifice Eldrazi Monument.

item.title: [sld] Swiftfoot Boots
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has hexproof and haste.

Equip {1}

item.title: [sld] Brainstorm
item.description:
Instant

Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

item.title: [sld] Arcane Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [sld] Crash Through
item.description:
Sorcery

Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

Draw a card.

item.title: [sld] Swamp
item.description:
Basic Land — Swamp

({T}: Add {B}.)

item.title: [sld] Island
item.description:
Basic Land — Island

({T}: Add {U}.)

item.title: [sld] Island
item.description:
Basic Land — Island

({T}: Add {U}.)

item.title: [afc] Wild Endeavor
item.description:
Sorcery

Roll two d4 and choose one result. Create a number of 3/3 green Beast creature tokens equal to that result. Then search your library for a number of basic land cards equal to the other result, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [afc] Maddening Hex
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura Curse

Enchant player

Whenever enchanted player casts a noncreature spell, roll a d6. Maddening Hex deals damage to that player equal to the result. Then attaching Maddening Hex to another one of your opponents chosen at random.

item.title: [afc] Gratuitous Violence
item.description:
Enchantment

If a creature you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

item.title: [afc] Vengeful Ancestor
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Dragon

Flyingh

When Vengeful Ancestor enters the battlefield, goad target creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

Whenever a goaded creature attacks, it deals 1 damage to its controller.

item.title: [afc] Neverwinter Hydra
item.description:
Creature — Hydra

As Neverwinter Hydra enters the battlefield, roll X d6. It enters with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the total of those results.

Trample

Ward {4} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {4}.)

item.title: [afc] Wulfgar of Icewind Dale
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Barbarian

Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)

Whenever a creature you control attacking would case a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

item.title: [afc] Klauth, Unrivaled Ancient
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dragon

Flying, haste

Whenever Klauth, Unrivaled Ancient attacks, add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is the total power of attacking creatures. Spend this mana only to cast spells. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

item.title: [afc] Berserker's Frenzy
item.description:
Instant

Cast this spell only before combat or during combat before blockers are declared.

Roll two d20 and ignore the lower roll.

1-14 | Choose any number of creatures. They block this turn if able.

15-20 | You choose which creatures block this turn and how those creatures block.

item.title: [afc] Chaos Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying, haste

Chaos Dragon attacks each combat if able.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, each player rolls a d20. If one or more opponents had the highest result, Chaos Dragon can't attack those players or planeswalkers they control this combat.

item.title: [afc] Bag of Tricks
item.description:
Artifact

{4}{G}, {T}: Roll a d8. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card with mana value equal to the result. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [afc] Druid of Purification
item.description:
Creature — Human Druid

When Druid of Purification enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player may choose an artifact or enchantment you don't control. Destroy each permanent chosen this way.

item.title: [afc] Indomitable Might
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Flash

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

Enchanted creature's controller may have it assign combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

item.title: [afc] Dragonborn Champion
item.description:
Creature — Dragon Warrior

Trample

Whenever a source you control deals 5 or more damage to a player, draw a card.

item.title: [afc] Klauth's Will
item.description:
Instant

Choose one. If you control a commander as you cast this spell, you may choose both.

• Breathe Flame — Klauth's Will deals X damage to each creature without flying.

• Smash Relics — Destroy up to X target artifacts and/or enchantments.

item.title: [afc] Thorough Investigation
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you attack, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JuG8gigPnlM

item.title: [afc] Wand of Orcus
item.description:
Legendary Artifact — Equipment

Whenever equipped creature attacks or blocks, it and Zombies you control gain deathtouch until end of turn.

Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, create that many 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

Equip {3}

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JuG8gigPnlM

item.title: [afc] Arcane Endeavour
item.description:
Sorcery

Roll two d8 and choose one result. Draw cards equal to that result. Then you may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to the other result from your hand without paying its mana cost.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JuG8gigPnlM

item.title: [afc] Component Pouch
item.description:
Artifact

{T}, Remove a component counter from Component Pouch: Add two mana of different colors.

{T}: Roll a d20.

1-9 | Put a component counter on Component Pouch.

10-20 | Put two component counters on Component Pouch.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JuG8gigPnlM

item.title: [afc] Grave Endeavour
item.description:
Instant

Roll two d10 and choose one result. Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to that result. Then each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the other result.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JuG8gigPnlM

item.title: [afc] Extract Brain
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent chooses X cards from their hand. Look at those cards. You may cast a spell from among them without paying its mana cost.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JuG8gigPnlM

item.title: [afc] Minn, Wily Illusionist
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Gnome Wizard

Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 blue Illusion creature token with "This creature gets +1/+0 for each other Illusion you control."

Whenever an Illusion you control dies, you may put a permanent card with mana value less than or equal to that creature's power from your hand onto the battlefield.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JuG8gigPnlM

item.title: [afc] Midnight Pathlighter
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Creatures you control can't be blocked except by legendary creatures.

Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JuG8gigPnlM
